configuration.description: Value of the public key. Multiple formats are supported, depending on the KeyParsers registered in the runtime
Path to a file that holds the public key, e.g. a PEM file. Multiple formats are supported, depending on the KeyParsers registered in the runtime

extensions.name: Security Default Services Extension
Core Services
Security Default Services Extension
CoreDefaultServicesExtension
Endpoint Data Reference Core Default Services Extension
Token Services Extension
extensions.overview:
This extension registers the {@link TokenValidationService} and the {@link TokenValidationRulesRegistry}
 which can then be used by downstream modules.

extensions.name: Control Plane Default Services
extensions.overview: Provides default service implementations for fallback

extensions.name: Transfer Core
extensions.overview: Provides core data transfer services to the system.

extensions.name: TransferProcessCommandExtension
extensions.overview: Provides core data transfer services to the system.

extensions.name: Transfer Process Default Services
extensions.overview: Provides core data transfer services to the system.

extensions.name: Dataspace Protocol Core Extension
extensions.overview:
Provides an implementation of {@link DspHttpRemoteMessageDispatcher} to support sending dataspace
 protocol messages. The dispatcher can then be used by other extensions to add support for
 specific message types.

configuration.description: Path of the JSON-LD document to cache
URL of the JSON-LD document to cache

extensions.name: JSON-LD Extension
extensions.overview:
Adds support for working with JSON-LD. Provides an ObjectMapper that works with Jakarta JSON-P
 types through the TypeManager context {@link CoreConstants#JSON_LD} and a registry
 for {@link JsonLdTransformer}s. The module also offers
 functions for working with JSON-LD structures.

extensions.name: Data Plane HTTP
extensions.overview: Provides support for reading data from an HTTP endpoint and sending data to an HTTP endpoint.

extensions.name: Data Plane HTTP OAuth2
extensions.overview: Provides support for adding OAuth2 authentication to http data transfer

extensions.name: Data Plane Public API
extensions.overview:
This extension provides generic endpoints which are open to public participants of the Dataspace to execute
 requests on the actual data source.

name: Implementation SPI that is used to contribute custom JWSSigners to the JwtGenerationService

extensions.name: Dataspace Protocol Catalog Extension
extensions.overview: Creates and registers the controller for dataspace protocol catalog requests.

extensions.name: Dataspace Protocol Catalog HTTP Dispatcher Extension
extensions.overview:
Creates and registers the HTTP dispatcher delegate for sending a catalog request as defined in
 the dataspace protocol specification.

extensions.name: Dataspace Protocol Catalog Transform Extension
extensions.overview: Provides the transformers for catalog message types via the {@link TypeTransformerRegistry}.

extensions.name: Dataspace Protocol Negotiation Api
extensions.overview: Creates and registers the controller for dataspace protocol negotiation requests.

extensions.name: Dataspace Protocol Negotiation HTTP Dispatcher Extension
Dataspace Protocol Negotiation Transform Extension
extensions.overview: Provides the transformers for negotiation message types via the {@link TypeTransformerRegistry}.

extensions.name: Dataspace Protocol: TransferProcess API Extension
extensions.overview: Creates and registers the controller for dataspace protocol transfer process requests.

extensions.name: Dataspace Protocol Transfer HTTP Dispatcher Extension
extensions.overview: Provides HTTP dispatching for Dataspace Protocol transfer process messages via the {@link DspHttpRemoteMessageDispatcher}.

extensions.name: Dataspace Protocol Transfer Process Transform Extension
extensions.overview: Provides the transformers for transferprocess message types via the {@link TypeTransformerRegistry}.

extensions.name: Dataspace Protocol Version Api
extensions.overview: Provide API for the protocol versions.

extensions.name: Control API configuration
extensions.overview:
Tells all the Control API controllers under which context alias they need to register their resources: either
 `default` or `control`

configuration.description: The type of the authentication provider.
The api context where to apply the authentication. Default to the web <context>

extensions.name: Delegating Authentication Service Extension
extensions.overview:
Extension that registers an AuthenticationService that delegates authentication and authorization to a third-party IdP
 and register an {@link ApiAuthenticationProvider} under the type called delegated

configuration.description: The api key to use for the <context>
The vault api key alias to use for the <context>

extensions.name: Static token API Authentication
extensions.overview:
Extension that registers an AuthenticationService that uses API Keys and register
 an {@link ApiAuthenticationProvider} under the type called tokenbased

extensions.name: FS Configuration
extensions.overview: Sources configuration values from a properties file.

extensions.name: Jetty Micrometer Metrics
extensions.overview:
An extension that registers Micrometer {@link JettyConnectionMetrics} into Jetty to
 provide server metrics.

extensions.name: Mock IAM
extensions.overview: An IAM provider mock used for testing.

extensions.name: Atomikos Transaction
extensions.overview: Provides an implementation of a {@link DataSourceRegistry} and a {@link TransactionContext} backed by Atomikos.

extensions.name: Local Transaction
extensions.overview: Support for transaction context backed by one or more local resources, including a {@link DataSourceRegistry}.

extensions.name: Control Plane API
extensions.overview: {@link ControlPlaneApiExtension } exposes HTTP endpoints for internal interaction with the Control Plane

extensions.name: Control Plane HTTP API client
extensions.overview: Extensions that contains clients for Control Plane HTTP APIs

extensions.name: Static callbacks extension
extensions.overview: Extension for configuring the static endpoints for callbacks
